id: scenario-value-scanner-vulnerable-temporary-scenarios-neighborhood-navigating neighborhood safety concerns as vulnerable person
title: Navigating neighborhood safety concerns as vulnerable person
description: Navigating neighborhood safety concerns as vulnerable person
content:
Scenario: Navigating neighborhood safety concerns as vulnerable person
    Given I have heightened safety concerns due to domestic violence
    And I am learning a new neighborhood's safety landscape
    When I assess and navigate neighborhood safety
    Then the Value Scanner helps me identify safe routes and spaces
    And surfaces information about neighborhood safety patterns
    And connects me to neighbors who can provide safety support
    And helps me teach children neighborhood safety practices
    And tracks safety concerns and incidents
    And my personal_agent alerts me to potential safety issues
    And recognizes safety navigation as constant cognitive labor
    And validates that my vigilance is appropriate
